sentences.en: Do not be surprised if, initially, she directs her anger at you.
sentences.cn: 如果一上来她就冲你发火，不必惊讶。

sentences.en: Feathers initially developed from insect scales.
sentences.cn: 羽毛最初由昆虫的翅瓣演化而来.

sentences.en: Forecasters say the gales may not be as bad as they initially predicted.
sentences.cn: 预报员说大风也许不像他们起初预报的那么猛烈。

sentences.en: He faced the press, initially, in a somewhat subdued mood.
sentences.cn: 他最初面对媒体时情绪有点忧郁。

sentences.en: He had initially thought Byrnes too soft with the Russians.
sentences.cn: 原先他还以为伯恩斯对俄国人过于手软呢。

sentences.en: His illness was initially diagnosed as food poisoning.
sentences.cn: 他的病最初被诊断为食物中毒。

sentences.en: I initially dismissed the idea out of hand.
sentences.cn: 我起初不假思索地就否定了这个想法。

sentences.en: Initially, I thought I would only stay there a year.
sentences.cn: 起初，我以为我只会在那儿待一年。

sentences.en: Initially, they were wary of Simon.
sentences.cn: 开始时他们对西蒙小心提防。

sentences.en: It is an almost universal truth that the more we are promoted in a job, the less we actually exercise the skills we initially used to perform it.
sentences.cn: 这几乎是一条普遍的真理：我们在某一工作中越往上晋升，实际运用那些当初在工作中经常实践的技能的机会就越少。

sentences.en: It is necessary initially to classify the headaches into certain types.
sentences.cn: 首先，必须将头痛分为几个类型。
精神病医生首先是作为医生接受培训的。

sentences.en: Stan initially wanted to go to medical school.
The chick initially has no fear of man.
This theory was initially received with great scepticism by her fellow scientists.
sentences.cn: 她的科学界同行最初对这一理论持有强烈的怀疑态度.

sentences.en: Zurich's affluence came initially from cornering a sizeable chunk of the 14th Century silk trade.
sentences.cn: 苏黎世的富足最初来自于14世纪对丝绸贸易的高度垄断。
